isValidSignature(bytes32,bytes).details: MUST return the bytes4 magic value 0x1626ba7e when function passes. MUST NOT modify state (using STATICCALL for solc < 0.5, view modifier for solc > 0.5). MUST allow external calls.

params.hash: Hash of the data to be signed

isValidSignature(bytes32,bytes).notice: Returns whether the provided signature is valid for the provided data
